synonyms: rāga-bhaktye—by the discharge of spontaneous devotional service; vraje—in Vṛndāvana; svayam—Himself; bhagavāne—the Supreme Personality of Godhead; pāya—one gets.
translation: "By executing spontaneous devotional service in Vṛndāvana, one attains the original Supreme Personality of Godhead, Kṛṣṇa.
